original_title: El diminuto mundo de David el Gnomo
overview: The Gnomes Council has decided to create the Royal Order of Knights of the Environment, whose mission it will be to watch over the well-being and protection of all living creatures. Once again the tiny world of the Gnomes is preparing to save Nature from the activities of men –as unfortunately bigger does not always mean better.
title: The Tiny Little World of David The Gnome
